title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather requirements for the Functional Web Server Framework, analyze the functional programming principles and stateless request handling needs.

title: Design the Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the Functional Web Server Framework, considering stateless request handling and composable middleware.

title: Implement the Core Web Server
description: Implement the core web server based on the designed architecture, ensuring stateless request handling.

title: Implement Composable Middleware
description: Create composable middleware to add functionality to the web server requests.

title: Database Integration
description: Integrate a database for storing and retrieving data as needed by the Functional Web Server Framework.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Test the Functional Web Server Framework for functionality, performance, security, and compatibility issues.

title: Deployment and Documentation
description: Deploy the Functional Web Server Framework to a production environment, document the framework for future reference.
